ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Expansion 3
ygData.msgSnippet: Its called paying to beta test star wars :P Halana/Tani
ygData.messageBody:
Its called paying to beta test star wars :P
Halana/Tani

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 8:56 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Expansion 3
>
>
> Now come on...that's inflammatory, and doesn't even begin to give it a
> chance!! :P
>
> I find it intriguing, to say the least. I would assume that
> transport in
> this case, instead of being mechanical (eg: boat), would be
> magical (eg:
> portal of some type). Or may even require another PC of the
> appropriate
> class with the appropriate teleport spell.
>
> I'm looking forward to it. :)
>
> Atonal
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike.Roach@... [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2001 10:39 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Expansion 3
>
>
> "...will introduce EverQuest fans to an enchanting moonscape..."
>
> "...takes voyagers to a satellite hovering ominously above
> the world of
> Norrath..."
>
> What? I don't really want sci-fi in my fantasy RPG, are we
> going to be
> shooting mobs with "laser" guns?
>
> -Faras
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
